Score Calculation module

score_calculation.get_min_o_reduction(current_node, length, relative_direction, axis, state_grid)

Counts free positions next to the move.

score_calculation.calculate_distance_to_obstacles(state_grid, current_node, neighbor_pos)

Calculates the amount of obstacles next to the move divided by the maximum possible amount of obstacles next to the move.

score_calculation.get_worst_move_cost(part_cost)

Calculates the cost of the worst move.

score_calculation.get_f_score(current_score_start_distance, current_score_goal_distance, current_score_extra, total_score_current_node, algorithm)
score_calculation.get_m_score(algorithm, weights, neighbor_pos, goal_pos, upper_bound)

Calculates normalized M Score.

score_calculation.get_e_score(algorithm, weights, current_pos, neighbor_pos, part_id, part_cost, worst_move_cost, current_state_grid)

Calculates normalized E Score for MCA*/MCSA*.
